name: SmokeWebTest
description: Simple http request to test response of a service.
author: Miguel Cruz

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url subject to the test. ie http://yourdomain.com/api

inputs.name: expectedReturnCode
inputs.label: Expected Return Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: Expected HTTP return code. ie 200. Accepted values: 100-599.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Time in seconds before request times out. Accepted values: 1-600

inputs.name: retries
inputs.label: Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of retries. Default = 0. Accepted values: 1-10

inputs.name: seconds
inputs.label: Time in seconds between retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Time in seconds seconds between retries. Default = 1. Accepted values: 1-30
